name: Soul Swap
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Soul is an algorithmic, cross-chain AMM and P2P lending protocol (on Fantom) built for traders, investors, developers, and visionaries seeking to unlock a universe of open financial applications.
